# Welcome to My Data Science Portfolio

Welcome to the official website of **Jared Zirkes**, a passionate data scientist. On this site, you'll find a collection of my data science projects, insights, and experiments, showcasing my journey in the world of data analysis, machine learning, and statistical modeling.

### About Me

I hold a Master of Science in Data Science & Analytics from Georgetown University and a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration with a focus on Finance, Economics-Strategy, and Business Analytics. With a background in analytics, I have experience in conducting research, building predictive models, and delivering actionable insights. 

### Projects

Here are some of the key data science projects I've worked on:

- **MLB Hall of Fame Career Stats**: A project aimed at analyzing career statistics of MLB players to predict future Hall of Fame inductees.
- **News Recommender System**: A document retrieval system designed to recommend articles from diverse viewpoints.
- **Baseball Simulation**: A machine learning model to simulate MLB games based on player and team data.

For more details, visit each individual project page.
